law.catch_line: If any person loses the person's hunter's license, the person may make affidavit stating the date th...
law.text: If any person loses the person's hunter's license, the person may make affidavit stating the date the license was issued, its number, description, and the name of the designated person who issued the license. Upon receipt of this information the Department may issue a duplicate hunting license for a $5 fee.
